Kaggle dataset:
URL: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/utkalk/large-retail-data-set-for-eda/data
Slug: utkalk/large-retail-data-set-for-eda

Download (requires kaggle CLI configured with ~/.kaggle/kaggle.json):
1) pip install kaggle
2) kaggle datasets download utkalk/large-retail-data-set-for-eda -p data/external/retail_kaggle --unzip

Notes:
- Inspect CSVs after download; typical files may include transactions, products, customers.
- Start EDA: list CSVs and read the largest transactional file for insights.
